scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:worker
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:web && cd apps/worker && npx wrangler pages deploy ../web/dist --project-name i-call-on-web --branch main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:preflight && npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:web && npm run typecheck:worker
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:worker
scripts.test:steps: npm run test:unit && npm run test:functional && npm run test:integration
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run test
